short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: High-resolution project and user icons in GitLab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improves the look of project and user icons in GitLab for users of Retina monitors. It finds avatar images in GitLab pages and provides the browser with a higher-resolution version of them, if it exists.

Background:

GitLab users can upload high-resolution icons, but unfortunately GitLab currently scales them down to 48px. This extension attempts to request a less downscaled version of the icon. 

Main issue with Gitlab overzealous downscaling is filed as
https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/gitlab/-/issues/345020
